name: Serve the Society for Empowerment and Women Advancement
briefDescription: Serve the Society for Empowerment and Women Advancement located in Hazaribagh, Jharkhand.“Serve – SEWA” was established in the year 2000 and got its legal status on 11th October 2001 as a non- profit & non- political Trust. Since then, Serve-SEWA has been making sincere attempts for development of rural poor families, especially women, by suitable farm and non-farm activities. Serve-SEWA visualizes a peaceful, equitable, just and progressive value based advanced society, with truly empowered citizens, free from any caste, religion, gender and socio-economic related discrimination.
